marquee.span: TCamden City School District will be closed until further notice. The closure affects all school programming, including before- and after-school activities, all athletic and extracurricular practices and competitions during this time.

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 11pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 700; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 700; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 700; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: n compliance with Governor Murphy’s current executive orders (Order #104 and #107), signed in March 2020, all “public, private, and parochial preschool program premises, and elementary and secondary schools, including charter and renaissance schools, shall remain closed to students as long as this Order remains in effect.”

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span:
Please visit the Coronavirus Information Tab on the website for more details on Chromebook distribution, access to remote learning, meals, and additional resources. Also, we encourage you to stay connected to faculty and staff via our district social media. We will get through this together.
Virtual LIVE Advisory Board Meeting Information HERE.
Continued Learning Information can be accessed HERE. All access to meal sites for Camden City students can be found HERE. Access to technology surveys can be found HERE. Please visit our Coronavirus Information Hub often for the most up-to-date information.

br.em: Thank you for flexibility and understanding during this difficult time. Please stay safe.
